# Boots of Teleportation
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration; **CL** 9th

**Slot** feet

**Price** 49,000 gp

**Weight** 3 lbs.

**Description**

Any character wearing this footwear may *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]* three times per day, exactly as if he had cast the spell of the same name.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Teleport (Spell)|teleport]]*

**Cost** 24,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 504
